/*! ========================================================= * Argon Dashboard React - v1.2.2 ========================================================= * Product Page: https://www.creative-tim.com/product/argon-dashboard-react * Copyright 2022 Creative Tim (https://www.creative-tim.com) * Licensed under MIT (https://github.com/creativetimofficial/argon-dashboard-react/blob/master/LICENSE.md) * Coded by Creative Tim ========================================================= * The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all copies or substantial portions of the Software. */ // reactstrap components import Chart from "chart.js"; import { useState } from "react"; // react plugin used to create charts import { Bar, Line } from "react-chartjs-2"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import classnames from "classnames"; import React, { useRef } from "react"; import { Badge, Card, CardHeader, Col, DropdownMenu, DropdownItem, Nav, NavItem, NavLink, UncontrolledDropdown, DropdownToggle, Progress, Table, Container, Row, UncontrolledTooltip, CardBody, Button, Spinner, Input, Form, } from "reactstrap"; import { chartOptions, parseOptions, energychart } from "variables/charts.js"; // core components import Header from "components/Headers/Header.js"; import { Tab } from "bootstrap"; import { useEffect } from "react"; const Assistant = () => { const [value, setValue] = useState("Select Query"); const [source, setSource] = useState("/img/TPC-H 1.png"); const [view, setView] = useState(false); const [activeNav, setActiveNav] = useState(1); const [energychartData, setenergychartData] = useState("data1"); const Arch = useRef(); const Model = useRef(); const Core = useRef(); const Os = useRef(); const [arch, setArch] = useState(""); const [model, setModel] = useState(""); const [core, setCore] = useState(""); const [os, setOs] = useState(""); const energyMetric = [ "ALL", "CPU", "DISK", "MEMORY", "NETWORK", "FAN", "TOTAL ENERGY", ]; if (window.Chart) { parseOptions(Chart, chartOptions()); } function inputValue() { setArch("arm64"); Arch.current.value = arch; setModel("Coretex-A53"); Model.current.value = model; setCore("4"); Core.current.value = core; setOs("Ubuntu 18.04.5 LTS"); Os.current.value = os; } const changeImage = (value) => { setSource("/img/" + value + ".png"); }; const handleDropdownClick = (e) => { setValue(e.target.getAttribute("value")); changeImage(value); }; const handleChart = (e) => { setView(true); }; const toggleNavs = (e, index) => { e.preventDefault(); setActiveNav(index); setenergychartData("data" + index); }; return ( <>
{/* Page content */}

)}

*/} ); }; export default Assistant;
